column4: can I set up ubuntu as so to start windows by default instead of ubuntuÂ¿
it's grub's DEFAULT=N where N is the index of windows in grub's list (starting at 0) in /etc/default/grub i think
do you know if this  value will be overwritten when I do an upgrade?
no, if it's in /etc/default/grub it willbe saved
